description: Time: 2 AM GMT. Location: A remote army base in the desert. Officer Tyler Saint calls in Vince Ferelli for questioning. There's rumor on the base that a male soldier is sexually interested in other men. The war has been long and rough, and Tyler needs some stress relief. He decides to interrogate Vince for his own entertainment. Vince denies that he has such interest in men but Tyler persists. Tyler uses BDSM, electricity and MC (mind control) to get the truth out of Vince. In the end, the truth prevails.
title: Don't Ask Don't Tell
